description: This hearty vegan club sandwich is made with slabs of smoky, spicy roasted sweet potatoes, lettuce, tomato and cilantro lime cashew mayo, piled between slices of toasty bread.
name: Sweet Potato Club with Cilantro Lime Cashew Mayo
recipeIngredient: 2 medium sweet potatoes (scrubbed and sliced into 1/4 to 1/2 inch thick slabs)
1 cup raw cashews (soaked in water 4-8 hours, rinsed and drained)
1/4 cup fresh cilantro (or more if you like, packed)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 350Â°. Lightly oil or line a baking sheet with parchment.
Stir sriracha, maple syrup, lime juice, olive oil and liquid smoke together in small bowl.

Arrange sweet potato slabs on baking sheet and brush with about 1/4 of sriracha mixture. Bake 15 minutes. Flip, brush with another 1/4 of sriracha mixture, reserving the remaining half, and bake another 15 minutes, until tender. Remove from oven and sprinkle lightly with salt.
